name: Riot Control
description:
Dispatch called you in, your all we got left. The riots in the city are getting out of control and only you can settle this. You and (soon) a friend cooperate and work to defend and stop these riots made up of a variety of enemies to tackle down.

This game is made by me only, (Crazy Potato) and I plan to keep working on this project for a bit until I feel it is complete or at least in a state in the game I can call good.

(CURRENTLY ONLY WORKS WITH CONTROLLER, PC CONTROLS COMING SOON!)
